text: Top of the Food Chain is a 1999 Canadian comedy-horror film directed by John Paizs and starring Campbell Scott, Fiona Loewi, and Tom Everett Scott. A parody of alien invasion movies of the 1950s, it was released on video in the United States under the title Invasion! The film revolves around a vacationing atomic scientist who encounters mysterious carnivorous beings disguised as traveling salesmen who are feeding on the eccentric population of the small isolated town of Exceptional Vista.The New York Times ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 films Category:Canadian films Category:English-language films Category:Canadian science fiction comedy films Category:1990s parody films Category:1990s science fiction comedy films Category:1990s science fiction horror films Category:1990s comedy horror films Category:Canadian comedy horror films Category:1999 comedy films
title: Top of the Food Chain
